page.title: 04PONTYPOOL TERTIARY COLLEGE
page.content:
{Pontypool Tertiary College}
In an area of Pontypool known as "The Race" at the top of Blaendare Road, Pontypool College was built in 1957. It cost Â£115,372 to build. There are 3,5OO students and there are 112 full-time teachers and lecturers. Some of the many facilities in the college are canteen, library, 35 Computers and an Audio Visual Room, etc. The students must be sixteen years old to start a Course. There are thirty-four O Level Courses, twenty-eight A level Courses, many Foundation and Diploma Courses. They also have night-school. In the morning they start the session at 9.OOa.m. and finish at 9.3Op.m. The car park holds approximately 4OO cars.
